name: Ocean Tower Defence
description:
Ocean Tower Defence is strategy game with 32 levels. Your mission is to build a maze of attacking towers to defend your side. You can use different weapons with abilities. You should build maze-like structures to kill the enemy ships. 

Also the game supports modding. You can create new towers, enemies and levels by editing xml files. In resources directory there are xml files with names "Towers.xml", "Enemies.xml" and "Passage.xml".

 Enjoy!
